fields.name: ğŸ“œ Step 1: Read and Accept the Rules
fields.value: Visit the <#558289444927700992> channel and read through the rules. When you've read them all, and you're ready to follow them during your time in Compulsion, add a reaction to the bottom and then come back here to do the next step.

fields.name: ğŸ”— Step 2: Link Your Battle.net Account
fields.value:
Run the command below in the <#1403169588602212352> channel to authorize Jeeves to access your WoW characters:
```
/authorize
```
âœ… This is secure and only allows Jeeves to read your character data.

fields.name: ğŸ§â€â™€ï¸ Step 3: Set Your Main Character
fields.value:
Once your characters are synced, run:
```
/characters set-main
```
ğŸ¯ Select your main toon from the dropdown menu. This helps us know who youâ€™re raiding or pushing keys with!

fields.name: ğŸ§™â€â™‚ï¸ Step 4: Register Your Alts (Optional)
fields.value:
Jeeves automatically syncs all your characters, but you can manage visibility:

â€¢ `/characters view` â€“ See your synced characters
â€¢ `/characters hide` â€“ Hide any alts you donâ€™t want visible
â€¢ `/characters ignore` â€“ Remove a character entirely from tracking

fields.name: ğŸ’¬ Wanna prog? Ping Brakk
fields.value: Once you have all that set up, if you are interested in Progression raiding with us, send a quick DM to <@512839235921772544> with your main toon's name, class, and spec so I can add you to the Raid Recruits list. We'll use this list as our primary input for sourcing raiders for season 3.

fields.name: ğŸ’¡ Helpful Tips
fields.value:
ğŸ”„ You can change your main anytime by re-running `/characters set-main`
ğŸ”„ Update your roles & professions by running `/roles update`
ğŸ‘€ Use `/characters view` to see your synced characters
â“ Need help? Post in <#1401394945901989898> or contact an <@&558295148916637696>
